subject: Withdrawing of Policy Circular No. 1.3.1.19/2019 dated 15th April; 2019- reg.
text: HRay 74TTTHNfqfearrot (7935 9dev &r TTHRf #T4, IRT TRTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 77y44 Ta 0f1-5 Qa 6, Taz7-10, &1VFT, 78f fevlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/Administration/ 2024 Policy Circular No.1.3.1.36/2024 dated August, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. ADMIN-11014/6/2024-0/0 GM (HR/Admin-III) (Comp. No. 252325)} Sub: Withdrawing of Policy Circular No. 1.3.1.19/2019 dated 1th April, 2019- reg: It has been decided to withdraw the Policy Circular No. 1.3.1.19./2019 dated 15th April, 2019 (copy enclosed) relating to clarification issued with regard to non-applicability of Maternity Benefits Act, 1961 to External Professionals   (EPs) &   Young Professionals (YPs) engaged by NHAI: 2. The concerned Officers/Finance Division at NHAI HQs/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs are requested to take necessary action in this matter. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above Sl3k 4 (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers & Employees of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation. 'M 7 7 % NHAI New Tn_ O5th Copy
